In this text I will explain how to create a small script file.

= Introduction =
Go to console and type (explained on [http://code.google.com/intl/de/closure/compiler/docs/gettingstarted_app.html this page]):
{{{
java -jar compiler.jar \
--compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS \
--js /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog/projekte/datepickerClosure.js \ --js_output_file datepickerClosure-compiled.js
}}}

or even better if you use the [http://code.google.com/intl/de-DE/closure/library/docs/calcdeps.html dependency tree calculation script]:

{{{
python calcdeps.py \
-i /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog/projekte/datepickerClosure.js \
-p /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog \
-o compiled \
-c /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure-compiler/compiler.jar
-f "--compilation_level=ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS" > /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog/projekte/closureDatepicker.js
}}}
